description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=2/3. Academy Trivia is an exciting take on classic trivia games. Played like a table top game, Academy Trivia features bonuses and penalties which add an exciting twist to any game. Academy Trivia features more than 40 hours of gameplay with a whopping 4000+ questions spread across eight categories, including a special extra hard category known as The Academy, designed to put you to the ultimate test!
